Summary •	Experienced system engineer in the leading global cross-functional teams, managing a product line through a full product life cycle, justifying new product development investments, determining and documenting new product requirements with strong analytical skills. 
•	Experiences with presenting to senior management, representing senior management in the discussions with other teams in the company, meeting with customers, training and assisting marketing/sales force, and coordinating the activities of region product managers. 
•	More than six years of successful team leader experiences. Coordinated a global engineering developer team with sites in US, India and China. Ability to drive complex projects from concept to fully operational status.  
•	In-depth knowledge of LTE, GSM, UMTS, IMS, CDMA, VOIP, IP network architecture and signaling protocols. Familiar with 3GPP/ITU/ANSI standards. 
•	Extensive software design, implementation, testing, and customer support experiences with strong coding and debugging skills on large complex systems. Proficiency in C, C++ and UNIX. 
• MBA study specialized in the Business Intelligence and Data Mining. 
•	Highly efficient, self-motivated, responsible and detail-digging problem solver and quick learner.

Summary Proven wireless industry experience with key contributions in wireless technology and chipset commercialization areas.Key contributor and initial member of QCOM 3G/4G team commercializing multiple generations of wireless products involving industry leading HSPA and LTE solutions. Expertise in leading projects from inception to commercialization with strong skills in employee innovative techniques to build and manage large teams. 
 
Currently leading multi-site technology teams responsible for the development of core wireless connectivity software protocols, IPs and the end products. 
 
Specialties:  
 
Technical: Experience in connectivity technologies (BT), IoT, modem technologies ( 2G, 3G and 4G), Chipset commercialization, platform software.  
 
Management: Building teams from inception, project planning and timely execution, people skills, strong customer partnerships.  
 
Managed bigger cross GEO teams to handle multiple host software stacks supporting different generation of QCOM SOCs. Close collaboration with OEMs, OS partners defining and contributing to next generation releases.
